青空に スマホがふるえ着信\r\n: Under the blue sky, my phone vibrates from a call
キミも授業中でしょ いったい何をしてるの\r\n: You're still in class with me!? What the heck you're doing!?
ふくらむカーテン 熱をはらんだ風が\r\n: From the billowing curtains, the winds bring in the heat
もうさ、一緒に抜け出しちゃおうか\r\n: Well, why don't we get out of here together?
思いがけずにじむヒロイン感\r\n: My heroine senses show up out of nowhere
昨日までの私とは違うの\r\n: I'm not the same person I was yesterday
永遠の＜Hey!＞一瞬閉じ込めて＜Yes!＞\r\n: Lock away ＜Hey!＞ a moment of eternity ＜Yes!＞
光るウェーブ＜Hey!＞したいこと全部＜Yes!＞\r\n: Shining wave＜Hey!＞ doing everything we want＜Yes!＞
し尽くしちゃうつもりだよ\r\n: We plan to do it all
